checkpoints.task: Find source of food and water
checkpoints.lore: In the harsh silence of the wild, you stumble upon a hidden spring and learn to forage edible plants — your first step toward survival.

checkpoints.task: Build a shelter for protection
checkpoints.lore: Using branches, stone, and your will to survive, you raise your first shelter — crude but comforting beneath the starlit sky.

checkpoints.task: Prepare for winter and summer
checkpoints.lore: You gather wool for the cold and shade for the heat, learning that survival isn't a moment — it's a rhythm with the seasons.

checkpoints.task: Obtain medical supplies to treat injuries
checkpoints.lore: After your first brush with danger, you seek out herbs, salves, and knowledge, transforming fear into preparedness.

checkpoints.task: Construct defensive structures around your camp
checkpoints.lore: You raise walls of stone and sharpened wood, not just to keep danger out — but to claim this place as your own.

checkpoints.task: Form alliances with trustworthy allies
checkpoints.lore: Strangers become partners as you trade stories by firelight and swear silent pacts of mutual survival.

checkpoints.task: Learn self-defense techniques
checkpoints.lore: You train daily, learning to read motion like language — every strike a sentence in the grammar of survival.

checkpoints.task: Create a dependable source of income
checkpoints.lore: Through trade, crafting, or service, you carve out stability in a world where chaos whispers at every edge.

levels.name: The Community
levels.title: Build strong relationships and a sense of community

checkpoints.task: Befriend and recruit new allies
checkpoints.lore: Each handshake, each shared meal expands the circle — until you're no longer just surviving, but belonging.

checkpoints.task: Organize social gatherings and bonding activities
checkpoints.lore: Laughter echoes through the camp as stories and songs bind you all in moments that outlast hardship.

checkpoints.task: Mediate conflicts among group members
checkpoints.lore: You become the quiet voice of reason — where swords might clash, your words bring calm.

checkpoints.task: Support and uplift your allies
checkpoints.lore: With a hand on a shoulder or a timely word, you remind others of their worth — and find yours reflected in them.

checkpoints.task: Complete challenging missions to gain respect
checkpoints.lore: Whispers of your name spread through the region — not for the tales you tell, but the ones others tell about you.

checkpoints.task: Improve skills and gain mastery in various fields
checkpoints.lore: You sharpen tools and mind alike, until mastery becomes second nature and failure becomes fuel.

checkpoints.task: Earn titles and accolades from peers
checkpoints.lore: With every earned honor, you stand taller — not above others, but among them, as a symbol of what's possible.

checkpoints.task: Help others to boost your reputation
checkpoints.lore: You lift others into their own greatness — and in doing so, you rise with them.

levels.name: The Summit
levels.title: Reach your full potential and achieve self-fulfillment

checkpoints.task: Pursue creative projects and innovations
checkpoints.lore: Ideas flow like rivers — from brushstroke to blueprint, you craft echoes of your soul into the world.

checkpoints.task: Mentor and inspire others
checkpoints.lore: You become the spark that lights new flames — a guide not just for paths walked, but for those yet dreamed.

checkpoints.task: Explore and understand your true purpose
checkpoints.lore: Through reflection and trial, you distill your experiences into clarity — and find meaning stitched through your journey.

checkpoints.task: Achieve a state of balance and enlightenment
checkpoints.lore: You walk with grace in chaos and stillness alike, no longer seeking — simply being.

levels.name: The Transcendence
levels.title: Go beyond self-fulfillment and contribute to the greater good

checkpoints.task: Lead large-scale humanitarian missions
checkpoints.lore: Your influence stretches wide — not through dominance, but through compassion that rallies the willing.

checkpoints.task: Advocate for social justice and equality
checkpoints.lore: You stand where others fall silent — a voice for those unheard, shaking the halls of power with truth.

checkpoints.task: Engage in practices promoting mental and spiritual well-being
checkpoints.lore: You nurture the unseen — the inner garden of the mind — and teach others to tend theirs.

checkpoints.task: Leave a lasting legacy for future generations
checkpoints.lore: Stone may crumble and names may fade, but your actions ripple across time like light on water.
